main.name: Kyle Provencal
main.occupation: recent graduate from the University of Massachusetts at Amherst with a BS in Computer Science
main.description: I have experience in full-stack development and a strong interest in cybersecurity
main.bio: I'm a software engineer and outdoor enthusiast from the beautiful state of Maine. I graduated from the University of Massachusetts in Amherst with a BS in Computer Science in February 2022. I have a passion for learning and building cool things.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me below for more information.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the technologies I'm familiar with. I'm always open to learning new things!

education.description: Completed a well-rounded curriculum of standard computer science concepts and studied more specific topics such as database management, search engine design, and natural language processing.

education.school: Maine School of Science and Mathematics
education.description: Introduced to calculus, physics, and computer science in a college-like environment.

work.title: Herbarium Lab Assistant
work.description: Imaged specimen, performed post-processing adjustments using Adobe Lightroom, georeferenced the collection locality, and entered specimen data into Specify.

work.title: Computer Lab Monitor
